nodes.bodyText: version 0.5.6 is the last version that worked with the lombok plugin.

https://github.com/kelloggm/checkerframework-gradle-plugin claims to work with the Lombok plugin.
(Ah, maybe your information is from experimentation rather than the plugin's documentation.)
Yes, I tried 0.5.7 and it fails with the same error. I tried 0.5.5 and it works as expected.  So, some change between 0.5.6 and 0.5.7 broke this example.
